name: Word Play
overview: A word game like Boggle created by Bob Blackmer and released in 1990. You can choose to play on a 4x4 or a 5x5 board. The game was included in Loadstar 128 #08. It included 3 levels of play, student, teacher and linguist difficulties. The database of words was selected from the Oxford American dictionary omitting any words described as abbreviations, informal, slang, archaic, or plural. You will have one minute in which to enter a word. The computer will have 10 seconds. 10 seconds.
